SEARCH
Package com.learneria.utils

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.learneria.utils.Database
public class Database extends Object
Handles all SQLite database logic for Papa's Learneria. Includes user management, score tracking, and word retrieval. Supports manual invalid input: '&' automatic API sync (Datamuse + Food + Nature) ✅ Now extended to support Teacher-Class system
